1.0.name: wordpress/contextual-partnership-link-exchange-plugin
1.0.description:
The Free Contextual Partnership Plugin for WordPress allows you to exchange contextual advertising / text links with hundreds of other quality WordPress bloggers completely hands free. It costs nothing to participate and takes only 5 minutes to setup via a simple WordPress Plugin. All you need is a website running WordPress, the links you wish to advertise on other blogs in the network, and the keyword terms you wish to use to generate those links.

It is designed to;

  • Drive targeted visitors to your own blog by placing keyword specific advertising links on hundreds of other content related blogs in the network for the keyword terms you define.

  • Enhance the user experience for your blog visitors by providing them with links to other blogs in the network that contain relevant information your visitors are interested in.

  • Increase your search engine rankings by automatically building highly targeted, keyword relevant, one way text l
